name: Grand Theft Auto: The Trilogy
storyline:
Grand Theft Auto III - After a Young Criminal's Girlfriend betrays him in a Bank Robbery. He is arrested the Police but manages to escape from Custody, He must now get revenge on his Girlfriend but in order to do so he must work his way up in the Criminal Underworld by any means necessary in Liberty City.

Grand Theft Auto: Vice City - After being released from prison, Tommy Vercetti, a former mobster, is sent to the sunny and dangerous Vice City. When a deal within the city goes horribly wrong, Tommy embarks on a journey across the city to reclaim what is rightfully his, no matter how many lives it takes.

Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas - After five years on the east coast, Carl Johnson returns to the city of Los Santos, San Andreas to find numerous fellow gang-members dead and enemy gangs having dominance of the city. Carl must take over the city and get his old gang back on top before the city destroys itself.
summary:
A bundle that contains the original trilogy from one of the most popular and critically acclaimed franchises in entertainment history.

- GTA III
- GTA Vice City
- GTA San Andreas
